trait.name: Shared Telepathy
entries: Any creature touching the cranium rat can use the rat's telepathy if the rat allows it. If the creature knows any language, the creature can use the telepathy to communicate words and emotions.

trait.name: Telepathic Shroud
entries: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.
